column4: how can i change those shortcuts like Super+T  opens trash on unity? (12.04) is there some tool to edit them? because the shortcuts section in system settings does not have any effect on this?
whoops sorry you said didn't you :p
several solutions here http://www.google.com/search?q=how%20to%20change%20shortcuts%20in%20unity but keep in mind this bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-control-center/+bug/995885
thx. so there is gonna be a fix for this soon? :)
